head.title: Mailing Lists
head.keywords: DocBook, SourceForge, mailing lists, discussion, notification

section.title: DocBook Discussion
section.para: Please use the OASIS DocBook Lists for general DocBook and DocBook tools discussions. Read the guidelines for information about which list is appropriate for your posting.
Note that a DocBook IRC channel is also available for real-time DocBook discussion.
A convenient mailing list search form is also available.

section.title: Project Notification
section.para: There are several read-only lists that provide updates about activity at the DocBook Open Repository project at SourceForge:
